overview.title: Project Overview
overview.description: As a team of four, we developed a comprehensive e-commerce platform in one month of intensive work. Collaborating closely with our Scrum Master through sprints and regular meetings, we managed the project efficiently. The platform was deployed using Azure DevOps cloud database.
